scripts.dev:chrome: npm run build:chrome && npm run watch:chrome
scripts.dev:firefox: npm run build:firefox && npm run watch:firefox
scripts.build: npm run lint && npm run format && npm run build:chrome && npm run build:firefox
scripts.watch:chrome: nodemon --watch . --ext js,html,json,png --ignore dist --ignore node_modules --exec "npm run build:chrome"
scripts.watch:firefox: nodemon --watch . --ext js,html,json,png --ignore dist --ignore node_modules --exec "npm run build:firefox"
scripts.copy:chrome: mkdir -p 'dist/chrome'; cp 'src/manifest.json' 'dist/chrome/'; cp 'src/background.js' 'dist/chrome/background.js'; cp 'src/popup.*' 'dist/chrome/'; cp 'src/options.*' 'dist/chrome/'; cp -r 'icons' 'dist/chrome/'
scripts.copy:firefox: mkdir -p 'dist/firefox'; cp 'src/manifest-firefox.json' 'dist/firefox/manifest.json'; cp 'src/background.js' 'dist/firefox/background.js'; cp 'src/popup.*' 'dist/firefox/'; cp 'src/options.*' 'dist/firefox/'; cp -r 'icons' 'dist/firefox/'
scripts.format: biome format --write src/background.js src/popup.js src/options.js src/popup.html src/options.html src/manifest.json src/manifest-firefox.json
scripts.check: biome check src/background.js src/popup.js src/options.js src/popup.html src/options.html src/manifest.json src/manifest-firefox.json
scripts.check:fix: biome check --write src/background.js src/popup.js src/options.js src/popup.html src/options.html src/manifest.json src/manifest-firefox.json
